NF.Q: In the column Sector Distribution of the sankey chart, which nodes have an outflow exceeded 18163? Please list the node labels and their corresponding outflow values.
NF.A: {Waste Management} has an outflow of {21093}, {Residential} has an outflow of {21477}.

NF.Q: Between which pairs of nodes in column Sector Distribution and column Emission Sources is the flow between 4918 and 6308? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {5018} from node {Agriculture} to {Livestock}.

NF.Q: In the sankey chart, which links have a flow between 5242 and 7738? Please list the source node, target node, and their corresponding flow values.
NF.A: There is a flow of {6807} from node {None} to {Manufacturing}, a flow of {5467} from node {None} to {Power Generation}, a flow of {7599} from node {Waste Management} to {Livestock}.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Power Generation to node Livestock and from node Waste Management to node Coal Combustion, which path has a larger flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Waste Management} to node {Coal Combustion} is larger.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Power Generation to node Livestock and from node Agriculture to node Livestock, which path has a larger flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Agriculture} to node {Livestock} is larger.

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Carbon Capture to node Transportation, from node Residential to node Livestock, and from node Power Generation to node Coal Combustion, which path has the largest flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Power Generation} to node {Coal Combustion} is the largest.

NC.Q: Among the flows from node None to node Power Generation, from node Transportation to node Coal Combustion, and from node None to node Residential, which path has the largest flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {None} to node {Residential} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which node in the column Emission Sources of the sankey chart is the most critical?
MSR.A: The most critical node in the column Emission Sources is {Coal Combustion}.

MSR.Q: What is the path with the highest total flow from source node Carbon Capture to target node Coal Combustion? Please list all node labels along this path.
MSR.A: The path with the highest total flow from node Carbon Capture to node Coal Combustion is: {Carbon Capture, Waste Management, Coal Combustion}.
